content: AC-D SP Type 1 Cut-off wheel High-performance thin cut-off wheel for cutting stainless/carbon steel using an angle grinder ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Engineered to offer the best balance between longer disc lifetime and higher stock removal rate Help to reduce time spent reworking – when you need a cleaner edge, cut-off wheels with a thickness of less than 1/16” (2 mm) are essential ANSI B7.1 compliant and OSA certified – these cutting wheels comply with the highest safety standards Applications Cutting steel and stainless steel pipes, rods, profiles and metal sheets Pipeline applications such as cutting and light notching steel or stainless steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Tool type: Angle grinder Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Tool type | Angle grinder | Disclaimer | Use angle grinder with double-sided guard | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Shape 21 | Arbor size | 7/8 in ### ITEMS- 2235159 - Cutting disc 4.5 x .045 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 25 pc - 2235170 - Cutting disc 5 x .045 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 25 pc - 2235171 - Cutting disc 6 x .045 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 25 pc - 2235172 - Cutting disc 7 x 1/16 x 7/8 T1 SP - Package Size 25 pc
